text:
@MarkRuffalo @realDonaldTrump Dear @MarkRuffalo
 
The #CoronaVirus originated in #Wuhan, #China
Naming the virus after it's geographical location is NOT making his supporters act out in any xenophobic or violent way. You're lying.
Speaking of violence, didn't you applaud the murdering of unborn babies? Sit
